channel.title: Following The Pattern — A Fringe Podcast
channel.description: Following The Pattern is a podcast dedicated to the Fox television series Fringe. Listen in as co-hosts Megan, Jennifer and Terry discuss each episode, report news and formulate theories. (Explicit)

item.title: Episode 64 - Season 4 Finale Longness
item.description:
Following The Pattern co-hosts, Jennifer, Terry and Megan, discuss the Fringe season 4, episode 22 - The Season Finale.

Listen now by clicking the play arrow to the left.

(Explicit)

We always love to hear your comments and theories.  Send listener feedback now >

Download this podcast episode as a MP3 file >
